mutants.code:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

def load_and_clean_csv(filename, default_value=1):
    df = pd.read_csv(filename, header=None)
    df = df.apply(pd.to_numeric, errors='coerce')
    df = df.fillna(default_value)
    return df.values

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

def load_and_clean_csv(filename, default_value=-1):
    df = pd.read_csv(filename, header=None)
    df = df.apply(pd.to_numeric, errors='coerce')
    df = df.fillna(default_value)
    return df.values

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

def load_and_clean_csv(filename, default_value=0):
    df = pd.read_csv(filename, header=None)
    df = df.apply(pd.to_numeric, errors='')
    df = df.fillna(default_value)
    return df.values
